data.name: Vaylantz of the Wireframe Abyss - Arctus XII
data.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card to your Main Monster Zone in its same column.
● Move 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone to an adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zone.
You can only use this effect of "Vaylantz of the Wireframe Abyss - Arctus XII" once per turn.
[ Monster Effect ] 2 Level 5 or higher "Vaylantz" monsters
This face-down card in the Extra Deck must first be Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control.  You can only use each of the following effects of "Vaylantz of the Wireframe Abyss - Arctus XII" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can switch the locations of 2 monsters in your Main Monster Zone or 2 monsters in your opponent's Main Monster Zone. If a card(s) in the Monster Zone moves to another Monster Zone: You can destroy 1 card on the field.
